original: BRODIN, Helmer Teodor, Ingenjör, Ålsten, f Umeå landsförs 2/6 89 av hemm.äg H T B o Augusta Andersson, gm Adine Hall. Umeå h a l till 06, ex Inst f Elektrotechn Zurich 14. Anst v Nilssons elektr byrå Umeå 06—08, Sydsv KraftAB Malmö 09—12, app.konstr o provruinsing Maschinenfabr Oerlikon Zurich 12—17, anst Mell o N:a Sv:s Ångpannefrn Sthlm 17—18, förest dess Hsandskont 19, nu övering.ass i Sthlm. Elektrifier.konsulent f Vnorrl l 19. Verkst utredn betr elektrifier i Vnorrl l 19—23 (Stat off utredn 1924:17), pro-jek o kontr elektr anläggn v fi norrl träind.-anläggn, kraftstationer o distrib.nät i Vnorrl 1. Styr.led Hsands elverk 32. Led Sv Tekn.frn. Ordf Tekn.frn i Hsand 34—36. Av trycket: Upps i tekn ämnen. PatrGM.
translated: BRODIN, Helmer Teodor, Engineer, Ålsten, born in Umeå rural parish on June 2, 1889, son of H T B and Augusta Andersson, married to Adine Hall. Studied at the Institute of Electrical Engineering in Zurich from 1914. Worked at Nilsson's Electrical Bureau in Umeå from 1906 to 1908, at Sydsvenska Kraft AB in Malmö from 1909 to 1912, as an apprentice in design and testing at Maschinenfabrik Oerlikon in Zurich from 1912 to 1917, employed by Mellansvenska och Norra Sveriges Ångpanneföreningen in Stockholm from 1917 to 1918, head of their Sales Department in 1919, currently a supervising assistant in Stockholm. Electrical consultant for northern Norrland since 1919. Executed investigations regarding electrification in northern Norrland from 1919 to 1923 (State official investigation report 1924:17), designed and contracted electrical installations for northern timber industry facilities, power plants, and distribution networks in northern Norrland. Board member of Hsand's power plant in 1932. Member of the Swedish Society of Technicians. Chairman of the Hsand branch of the Society of Technicians from 1934 to 1936. Published works related to technical subjects. Patented inventions.

structured.name: BRODIN, Helmer Teodor

memberOf.name: Hsand branch of the Society of Technicians

structured.description: Engineer and electrical consultant from Sweden
